item.title: EP 278 - Haunted Asylums: An Interactive Adventure!
item.itunes:title: Haunted Asylums: An Interactive Adventure!
item.description:
Today we go to court and find ourselves in a sticky situation, and then we visit 5 (actually 4) haunted asylums!

 

MERCH STORE!!!

https://www.redbubble.com/people/deadrabbitradio/works/35749420-dead-rabbit-radio?asc=u

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

Dual Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

"As Above" Flyer 

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

 

Judge gets 4 years for using sex toy on bench

https://www.pantagraph.com/news/judge-gets-years-for-using-sex-toy-on-bench/article_931dae6f-e2d8-5b4a-855c-78c0ce93a8a9.html

 

Hard Times for Penis Pump Judge

https://www.rebelcircus.com/blog/hard-times-for-penis-pump-judge/

 

America’s 10 Most Haunted Asylums (And Their True Horror Stories)

https://backpackerverse.com/10-most-haunted-insane-asylums-in-america/

 

Essex County Hospital Center

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Essex_County_Hospital_Center

 

THE LEGEND OF PENNHURST ASYLUM

https://pennhurstasylum.com/legend/

 

Halloween display at ex-Pennhurst site under fire

https://www.delcotimes.com/news/halloween-display-at-ex-pennhurst-site-under-fire/article_d1bf4e10-f57b-540a-9692-d4ab20c6ccdc.html

 

The Ridges

https://hauntedathensohio.com/the-ridges-mental-health-institution/

 

Athens Lunatic Asylum

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Athens_Lunatic_Asylum

 

Rolling Hills Asylum

https://www.rollinghillsasylum.com/

 

The Haunting of Rolling Hills Asylum

https://weirdnj.com/stories/rolling-hills-asylum/

 

Philadelphia State Hospital at Byberry

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Philadelphia_State_Hospital_at_Byberry

 

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black

 

"As Above" Art By Grant Scott

 

Dead Rabbit Skull By John from the SCAR Group

 

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Music By Dr. Huxxxtable

Rabbitron 3000 created by Eerbud

Thanks to Chris K, Founder Of The Golden Rabbit Brigade

 

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @DeadRabbitRadio

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

 

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

 

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018 - 2019
